description technical detail:
NEC SpectraView Reference 241-BK - 24.1" - LCD Monitor
Professional 24-inch color display. The NEC SpectraView Reference 241 is a high-end professional wide gamut P-IPS Performance LCD monitor for color critical applications with outstanding features and benefits for best picture quality and color accuracy, outstanding ergonomics and economics.
The NEC SpectraView Reference 241 is an ideal display for all creative professionals, designers, photographers, precision engineers and anyone who cannot accept compromise on color accuracy.
NEC SpectraView Reference 241 - LCD monitor - 24.1" - 1920 x 1200 - p-IPS - 360 cd/m2 - 1000:1 - 8 ms - 2xDVI-D, VGA, DisplayPort - black
features: Picture in picture, OmniColor, CableComp, Rapid Response, AutoBright, Advanced No Touch Auto Adjust, ErgoDesign, Intelligent Power Manager (IPM), sRGB colour management, TileMatrix, NaViSet, ColorComp, AmbiBright, Eco-Mode, real-time clock, Overdrive technology, Auto Brightness Stabilization, 107% Adobe RGB colour gamut, 98% Adobe RGB colour gamut, 14-bit gamma, TileComp, RapidMotion
